title: "The Great 8 Is Better Than The Great One"
description: In Sara's absence, Neil and Geoff discuss too much hockey and debate the merits of era adjusting records. The Athletic's Meg Linehan unpacks the latest in the USWNT lawsuit.
itunes:title: "The Great 8 Is Better Than The Great One"
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: In Sara's absence, Neil and Geoff discuss too much hockey and debate the merits of era adjusting records. The Athletic's Meg Linehan unpacks the latest in the USWNT lawsuit.
itunes:summary: In Sara's absence, Neil and Geoff discuss too much hockey and debate the merits of era adjusting records. The Athletic's Meg Linehan unpacks the latest in the USWNT lawsuit.
